articles.author: Arijit Sarkar
articles.title: Elon Musk reaffirms AI's potential to destroy civilization - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Musk highlighted the destructive potential of AI — just like any other technology — if it falls into the wrong hands or is developed with ill intentions.
articles.content: While tech giants worldwide work on materializing the idea of having a generative artificial intelligence (AI) to aid humans in their daily lives, some believe the risk of the nascent technology goin… [+1925 chars]
